title.rendered: The Right to Health in a Time of Crisis: What Have We Learned From Covid-19?

excerpt.rendered: International treaties stipulate that every human being is entitled to the highest attainable standard of health—yet Covid-19 has exposed stark gaps between commitment and reality.
